name: L'apprenti
description:
L'apprenti is an adventure game set in 1700s France where you play as Grenouille, an apprentice to a perfumer. You as the player are tasked to bring back items requested by your boss. Players will need to bargain and befriend villagers to acquire the items they need to please their boss. The game makes you feel like a french child from the 1700s.
